prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon that sparkles with brilliance and has a gemstone-like appearance.
I want a mythical Pokemon with a blend of pink and purple colors, featuring elegant wings.
Generate a diamond-themed Pokemon that embodies grace and beauty with a mystical aura.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a jewel, showcasing its elegant design and delicate features.
Imagine a majestic creature with a regal stance, adorned in glimmering stones and soft colors.
Design a Pokemon that combines fairy-like elegance with a touch of royal gem-like characteristics.
Show me a Pokemon that evokes a sense of wonder, with a color palette of soft pastels.
